welcomeSubtitle: Your all-in-one tool for academic success.
welcomeDescription: A comprehensive tool to support university and high school students for better writing, research, and study.
articleWriterDescription: Generate well-structured academic articles with citation support (APA, MLA, IEEE).
reportGeneratorDescription: Interactive system that guides you through creating comprehensive research reports.
grammarCheckerDescription: Advanced grammar and style correction for academic writing.
mindMapGeneratorDescription: Transform your ideas into dynamic mind maps for brainstorming.
summarizerParaphraserDescription: Academic-level summaries and paraphrasing while preserving meaning.
plagiarismCheckerDescription: Identify duplicated text and suggest original alternatives.
flashcardGeneratorDescription: Create study flashcards from your notes and textbooks.
quizGeneratorDescription: Generate quizzes from your notes and textbooks.
presentationGeneratorDescription: Create academic presentations with structured formatting.
taskPlannerDescription: Timeline-based planner for assignments and research projects.
writingSupervisorDescription: Get real-time feedback and suggestions as you write.
quickActionsSubtitle: The best tools for your academic success.
aboutSubtitle: Learn more about our mission and vision
aboutMission: Our mission is to provide free, high-quality academic tools to students and researchers around the world. We believe that education should be accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or financial situation.
aboutCreator: This platform was created with love by Abdulla Aziz, who understands the struggles that many students face when trying to access quality educational resources. Having experienced these challenges firsthand, he wanted to create a solution that would help others avoid the same struggles.
aboutVision: We envision a world where every student has access to the tools they need to succeed academically. By providing these resources for free, we hope to level the playing field and give everyone an equal opportunity to achieve their educational goals.
freeAccessDescription: All our tools are completely free to use, with no hidden fees or subscriptions required.
communityDescription: Built by students, for students, with the needs of the academic community in mind.
knowledgeDescription: Empowering students with tools to enhance their learning and research capabilities.
creatorsMessageText: I created this platform because I believe that education should be accessible to everyone. As someone who has struggled to find quality academic resources, I wanted to create a solution that would help others avoid the same challenges I faced. My hope is that this platform will empower students to achieve their academic goals and reach their full potential. Education is a fundamental right, not a privilege, and I'm committed to making quality academic tools accessible to all.
fileConverterDescription: Easily convert your files between different formats like DOCX, PDF, and TXT.
imageConverterDescription: Convert your images between formats like JPG, PNG, and WEBP.
compressorDescription: Reduce the size of your files and images without losing quality.
citationGeneratorDescription: Generate citations in different styles (APA, MLA, Chicago) from uploaded files or website links.
knowledgeGraphGeneratorDescription: Visualize connections between concepts and ideas from your text.
chatWithFileDescription: Chat with your documents (PDF, DOCX, etc.) and get answers with references.
